column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We started with a pitcher for Cava Sangria between 3 people. It was basically the perfect amount. About 3 drinks per person. It was fruity and delicious. We got Spicy Potatoes with Tomato Aioli
column6: and Grilled Octopus with mojo verde
column9: migas. Everything was delicious and quite filling even tho they were small plates. I like how they indicate the popular items in red on the menu. For dessert
column13: you can't go wrong with anything here especially the popular (red) items.
